TEXT.TITLE: BOISE CASCADE <BCC> COMPLETES SALE OF UNIT
TEXT.BODY: Boise Cascade Corp said it completed the previously announced sale of its Consumer Packaging Division to Sonoco Products Co <SONO> for approximately 175 mln dlrs. Reuter
